name: Ghostly Escape
description:
Our main character, Ghost, is a new addition to the zoo found in the small town of South Town. However, there are a couple of things to note. Ghost is actually a ninja penguin and most importantly, he despised being locked up in the zoo. So what are you going to do about it? You're going to help him out!!! Serve as Ghost's guide as you help him break out of the zoo and return back to his home in Antartica!
